creator: rohansarker@hotmail.com
text:
Dear Manager / Reviewer,


I downloaded Apache 2.4.10 Win32 from the link:

http://www.apachelounge.com/download/

I am using DELL Vostro Laptop with Windows 7 (32 Bit OS) with Intel Core i5 Processor.

My Apache Directory Structure is:

C:\Apache\Apache24

I tried to install Apache HTTP Server by the following commands in command prompt:


Microsoft Windows [Version 6.1.7601]
Copyright (c) 2009 Microsoft Corporation.  All rights reserved.

C:\Users\Dell>cd..

C:\Users>cd..

C:\>cd Apache

C:\Apache>cd Apache24

C:\Apache\Apache24>httpd -k install
'httpd' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

C:\Apache\Apache24>

I tried to search the file httpd.conf in C: and I found no results.

Please let me know if there is any bug in the installer for Windows 7 (32 Bit).

Thank you.





Regards
Rohan Sarker
CEO & Founder
SwitchGate CrystalShift

creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
Hi,

you should contact directly "Apache Lounge" for support for binaries build and maintained by them.


However, the file you have downloaded should be a zip file. You should have un-zipped it on your local (apparently in C:\Apache\Apache24)

httpd.exe should then be located in:
   C:\Apache\Apache24\bin

httpd.conf should be located in:
   C:\Apache\Apache24\conf


Best regards

creator: rohansarker@hotmail.com
text:
Dear Reviewer / Manager,

Thank you for your comments. I verified now and found that:

httpd.exe should then be located in:
   C:\Apache\Apache24\bin

httpd.conf should be located in:
   C:\Apache\Apache24\conf

I try to install with two ways as given in command prompt:

Microsoft Windows [Version 6.1.7601]
Copyright (c) 2009 Microsoft Corporation.  All rights reserved.

C:\Users\Dell>cd..

C:\Users>cd..

C:\>cd Apache

C:\Apache>cd Apache24

C:\Apache\Apache24>cd bin

C:\Apache\Apache24\bin>httpd -k install

Error: The program can't start because MSVCR110.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinsgtalling the program to fix this problem.

C:\Apache\Apache24\bin>cd..

C:\Apache\Apache24>cd conf

C:\Apache\Apache24\conf>httpd -k install
'httpd' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

C:\Apache\Apache24\conf>


But I failed. Please help me in installing Apache HTTP Server. I am so depressed. I am suffering from 1st Stage Parkinson from 2010.


Regards

creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
On http://www.apachelounge.com/download/win32/

Be sure that you have installed the Visual C++ 2010 SP1 Redistributable Package x86 : VC10 SP1 vcredist_x86.exe
(link provided at the above URL)


Please use Apache Lounge forum for question related to their binaries.

What you report is not a bug.
What you report is not related to Apache itself.
It is related to binaries compiled and maintained by Apache Lounge.
